title: Due to the increase in traffic on George Anderson Drive when the new developments are built, will a right turn lane be added to the stoplight from Geo. Anderson to Carolina Beach Road?  In the mornings 7:00am to 8:30am there is a long line of traffic to turn right when one car wants to go straight into Echo Farms and has to wait for the light.  Traffic could move much smoother if they did not have to wait but could just turn.
